test.conceptExample: The sun is the king of torches.

test.conceptDefinition: The moon is a silver pin-head vast, That holds the heaven's tent-hangings fast.
test.conceptExample: The moving Moon went up the sky, And nowhere did abide; Softly she was going up, And a star or two beside.

test.conceptDefinition: Surely the stars are images of love.
test.conceptExample: The stars are golden fruit upon a tree, All out of reach.
